User guide#

The practical use of smash is first done on a Practice case, allowing new users to have a global view of the available tools, from the creation of input data, to the output of results. In a second step, a Real case - Cance is set up on which all the methods/applications made on the Practice case are reapplied with more detailed explanations.

  • Practice case
    • Imports
    • Model object creation
    • Viewing Model
    • Input Data filling
    • Run
    • Getting data
  • Real case - Cance
    • Imports
    • Model object creation
    • Viewing Model
    • Run
    • Getting data
  • Model initialization
    • Setup
    • Mesh
